alert.note: Alert for Mariposa (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 15 at 9:03AM PDT until June 18 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in California... Merced River At Happy Isles affecting Mariposa County. For the Merced River...including Happy Isles...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Merced River At Happy Isles. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Campgrounds at North Pines and Housekeeping Camp begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM PDT Thursday the stage was 7.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 915 PM PDT.
